source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.title: Beginners Guide to Composting
items.headline: Learn how to introduce composting to your urban home or homestead!
objectives_summary: How to compost - What can and can't go in the compost bin
Types of Compost Bins and Placement
Benefits and importance of composting and waste diversion

items.title: How & Why to Inspect Your Hive

visible_instructors.title: Susan Butts
visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.job_title: Head Beekeeper and Co-Owner of Butts' Bees Apiary

items.headline: The Importance of Examining Comb ~  Zen Beekeeping
objectives_summary: Learn to inspect your hive with confidence.
Understand what to look for in the hive and on the comb.
Be at ease with the health of your hive.

items.title: A Beginner's Guide to Growing Roses in a Cold Climate

visible_instructors.title: Gina Schley
visible_instructors.name: Gina
visible_instructors.job_title: Owner SHEGROWS a Cut Flower Farm in Arvada Colorado

items.headline: Roses can not only grow but thrive in Colorado and similar climates
objectives_summary: Things to consider when growing roses in Zone 5 or colder climate
What are the 5 types of roses
How to choose what kind of roses to grow based on size, color and fragrance

items.title: Building Soil from Scratch for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Gina Schley
visible_instructors.name: Gina
visible_instructors.job_title: Owner SHEGROWS a Cut Flower Farm in Arvada Colorado

items.headline: If you want to have a successful garden, it all starts with the soil!
objectives_summary: How to prepare you soil for gardening especially in Colorado
What basic amendments you will need to get your soil balanced
How you can add organic materials to further enhance your soil

items.title: Irrigation 101: Introduction To Irrigation and Sprinklers
items.headline: Course 1 of Pro Irrigation Training's "Irrigation  101" series.  Learn all the basics of Irrigation.
objectives_summary: Know the history and modern uses of irrigation, understand the basic concepts and definitions of the industry, pick the proper type of system configuration, and use basic knowledge of water hydraulics.

items.title: Permaculture Made Easy! A Design Course for Sustainability!
items.headline: World reknowned teachers share design principles and the importance of human relationships to lower our carbon footprint
objectives_summary: This is the beginning of a Full Certificate Permaculture Design Course
You will learn Ecology, Our greatest world delemas (opportunities) Permaculture Principles. and What permaculture is all about
Permaculture Gardening is just the beginning! Permaculture Food forest, farming, urban, backyards are demonstrated here

items.title: Transform Your Space With Joy

visible_instructors.title: Mina Yang
visible_instructors.name: Mina
visible_instructors.job_title: LA-based feng shui and design consultant

items.headline: How to Bring Joy Into Your Home With Feng Shui Inspired Design
objectives_summary: Home decor
Feng shui
Interior design

items.title: Create A Butterfly Garden

visible_instructors.title: Jessica McAtee
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.job_title: Butterfly Conservationist, Semi-Digital Nomad, Tiny Houser

items.headline: 10 Critical Components
objectives_summary: Discover what butterflies live in your corner of the planet and how you can attract them.
Understand what butterflies require to survive.
Provide butterflies with a sanctuary to make the next generation.

items.title: SimPLife: The Way of the Practical Life
items.headline: Dedicated to Your Simpl, Sensible Self-Reliance, via Practical Logic, Investigation & Life's Example
objectives_summary: LEARN the intentions of Permaculture and BioDynamics, via everyday practical application, in lectures and hands-on videos.
CHOOSE Interdependency and shake free of Dependency, by the actions of your own hands, mind & heart- and via the beneficial engagement of your Guild
LEARN the many advantages of growing food, building useful & unique home and commercial projects- and to profit from this

items.title: Start a Career Installing Fiber Glass Insulation
items.headline: Through this training you will learn how to install fiber glass insulation and how to use these skills to get a new job.
objectives_summary: Install Insulation: Batt, Fiber Glass and Blowing wool
Learn about Insulation Safety
Settings for blowing wool machine

items.title: Mold / Mould: How to Improve Indoor Air Quality ?
items.headline: Learn how to improve indoor air quality in your home or office according to Health Canada Guidelines and Regulations.
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn about indoor air quality and how it affects human health.

items.title: How to Hang a TV Mount on The Wall (Master Class) Easy Way
items.headline: in this course I'll be teaching you how to hang a wall mount for your TV. It's very simple. But we go over it all.
objectives_summary: Upon completion of this course you will have the knowledge on how to hang any TV on the wall using a wall mount

items.title: How to Sand Your Wood Floors Easy (Master Class) Sanding 101
items.headline: In this course will be going over how to properly sand your wood floors. Most projects only take a few days to complete.
objectives_summary: Sand wood floors and make them look great

items.title: Start living a Minimalist Lifestyle and find your Happiness
items.headline: Beginner's road map to Minimalist Living
objectives_summary: The meaning of minimalist living
How to become a minimalist
How to declutter

items.title: Getting Started Stocking Your Pantry for Winter
items.headline: How to Use Your Garden Harvests & the Farmers Market to Eat Healthy All Year Round
objectives_summary: How to get started stocking your pantry for winter using produce from your garden or the farmers market.

items.title: Easy Gardening : Grow Vegetables, Herbs and Flowers at Home!
items.headline: Learn to grow your own Vegetables, Flowers and Herbs in your backyard or in your own home!
objectives_summary: How to Garden
How to Plant Flowers
How to Plant Herbs
